snippet.title: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Burst - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch Itachi and Sasuke take on Kabuto in this trailer for Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Burst.

Watch our main channel for all of our Comic-Con 2013 coverage!
http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespot/

Get even more Comic-Con 2013 at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/comic-con/
